name: Rapture
startIntroPart1:
Toe to toe 
Dancing very close

Barely breathing

Almost comatose

Wall to wall

People hypnotized
startIntroPart2:
And they're stepping lightly

Hang each night in rapture
declaringWar:
Even in the book of lies, sometimes you find truth. 
A season for all things! A time to live and a time to die, a time to build... AND A TIME TO DESTROY!
attacked:
I came to this place to build the impossible. You came to rob what you could never build 
- a Hun gaping at the gates of Rome. 

Even the air you breathe is sponged from my account; your very life needs leech off my capital, like a tick sucking the lifeblood of Rapture with every breath. 
Now I will suffer you no longer!
defeated: You can kill me, but you            have my city. My strength is not                  ,                                                 . A season for all things! A time to                    die!
introduction:
I am Andrew Ryan, and I'm here to ask you a question. Is a man not entitled to the sweat of his brow? 
'No!' says the man in Washington, 'It belongs to the poor.' 'No!' says the man in the Vatican, 'It belongs to God.' 'No!' says the man in Moscow, 'It belongs to everyone.' 
I rejected those answers; instead, I chose something different. 
I chose the impossible. 
I chose... Rapture, a city where the artist would not fear the censor, where the scientist would not be bound by petty morality, Where the great would not be constrained by the small! And with the sweat of your brow, you can get out. 
Rapture is mine: not a sunken ship for you to plunder, and I am not some giddy socialite who can be slapped around by government muscle.
neutralHello:
In the end, what separates a man from a slave? 
Money? Power? 
No. A man chooses, and a slave obeys.
neutralLetsHearIt: I am Andrew Ryan, and I'm here to ask you a question.
neutralNo: I am Andrew Ryan, and I'm here to ask you a question.
neutralYes: I am Andrew Ryan, and I'm here to ask you a question.
hateHello: Tell me, friend, which one of the bitches sent you? The KGB wolf, or the CIA jackal?
hateYes: I am Hate! Ryan, and I'm here to Hate! you Hate! question.
afterPeace:
Fab Five Freddy told me everybody's fly
DJ spinnin' I said, 'my my'
Flash is fast, Flash is cool
Fran√ßois c'est pas, Flash ain't no dude
And you don't stop, sure shot
Go out to the parking lot

And it comes right down and it lands on the ground
And out comes a man from Mars
And you try to run but he's got a gun
And he shoots you dead and he eats your head
And then you're in the man from Mars

You eat Cadillacs, Lincolns too
Mercurys and Subaru
And you don't stop, you keep on eatin' cars
Then, when there's no more cars you go out at night
And eat up bars where the people meet
Face to face, dance cheek to cheek
One to one, man to man
Dance toe to toe, don't move too slow
'Cause the man from Mars is through with cars
He's eatin' bars, yeah wall to wall
Door to door, hall to hall
He's gonna eat 'em all
Rapture, be pure
Take a tour through the sewer
Don't strain your brain, paint a train
You'll be singin' in the rain
Said don't stop to punk rock
tradeRequest: I'm sure you've gathered I have nothing but contempt for you conmen and the mass delusion you refer to as your 'nation'. I believe in no gods, no kings, but there is something more powerful than each of us: a combination of our efforts, a

of industry. 
But it is only when we struggle in our *own* interest that the chain pulls in the right direction. It is purely for my own benefit that I toss the chain to you; and it is in your own best interests that you pick it up.
